name: Minimal Series Black Loop
details:
2 Loop Switcher PedalThe Black Loop is a 2 Loop true bypass switcher with two DC outs.  It can be used as an AB Switch, Amp Channel Switcher or Tuner Output/Mute Switch. 
Players can connect multiple pedals into each loop to create two independent effect chains. The Black Loop is a great solution for bypassing vintage effect while not in use. The Black Loop has several uses, allowing for endless possibilities.
http://www.one-control.com/black-loop.html
